title: Can't login to client.
body: As per title. Gets to login screen, try to login and fails every time. Tried resetting IP and a couple of other things, was working perfectly fine yesterday. Anyone else got this issue?

replies.body: Thanks for the report - we're aware of this issue and investigating it. [Check out this thread for updates. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/9rNOyg9Q-login-issues-and-client-disconnection-02022016)
Don't worry, dude; it's not just you.

Have you tried everything listed [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#section-windows)? I'd say it's likely to be your Internet Explorer or DNS, that's stopping you from logging in.

You wouldn't happen to be using mobile broadband either right? That's been not working since forever for some reason.

If all else fails, send Riot a support ticket [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They usually reply within 1 - 2 days.
